description.ko: 수겁의 지질학적 압력에 의해 깎여 나간 지층과 광물 맥에 대한 세밀한 지형학적 연구입니다.
description.en: A detailed topographical study of earth layers and mineral veins carved by geological pressure over eons.

prompt: A macro-topographic cross-section of an ancient fault line, revealing jagged layers of #8B4513 obsidian, #D2691E red clay, and #F4A460 crystalline quartz veins glowing with internal heat. Side lighting from the golden hour creates deep shadows across the #2F4F4F bedrock, highlighting the rough textures of parched soil and sediment. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic geological textures, telling the narrative of a land carved by eons of time.
